text: L'Oudon is a former commune. It is found in the Normandy region in the Calvados department in the northwest of France. On 1 January 2017, it was merged into the new commune of Saint-Pierre-en-Auge.Arrêté préfectoral 19 December 2016 == Population == == Related pages == *Communes of the Calvados department == References == Category:Former communes in Calvados
title: L'Oudon
